34 class ArchiveXmlReader : public xml::InputBuffer
35 {
36 public:
46  static const int DEFAULT_OPTIONS;
47 
48  EPUB3_EXPORT ArchiveXmlReader(ArchiveReader * r);
49  EPUB3_EXPORT ArchiveXmlReader(unique_ptr<ArchiveReader>&& r);
50  EPUB3_EXPORT ArchiveXmlReader(ArchiveXmlReader&& o);
51  virtual ~ArchiveXmlReader();
52 
53  operator ArchiveReader* () { return _reader.get(); }
54  operator const ArchiveReader* () const { return _reader.get(); }
55 
56  virtual size_t size() const { return _reader->total_size(); }
57  virtual size_t offset() const { return _reader->position(); }
58 
59  bool operator !() const { return !bool(_reader); }
60 
61  using InputBuffer::xmlReadDocument;
62  using InputBuffer::htmlReadDocument;
63 
68  std::shared_ptr<xml::Document> xmlReadDocument(const char * url, const char * encoding);
69  std::shared_ptr<xml::Document> htmlReadDocument(const char * url, const char * encoding);
70 
71 protected:
72  std::unique_ptr<ArchiveReader> _reader;
73 
74  virtual size_t read(uint8_t * buf, size_t len);
75  virtual bool close();
76 
77  ArchiveXmlReader(const ArchiveXmlReader&) _DELETED_;
78 };
79 
83 class ArchiveXmlWriter : public xml::OutputBuffer
84 {
85 public:
86  EPUB3_EXPORT ArchiveXmlWriter(ArchiveWriter * r);
87  EPUB3_EXPORT ArchiveXmlWriter(unique_ptr<ArchiveWriter>&& r);
88  EPUB3_EXPORT ArchiveXmlWriter(ArchiveXmlWriter&& o);
89  virtual ~ArchiveXmlWriter();
90 
91  operator ArchiveWriter* () { return _writer.get(); }
92  operator const ArchiveWriter* () { return _writer.get(); }
93 
94  virtual size_t size() const { return _writer->total_size(); }
95  virtual size_t offset() const { return _writer->position(); }
96 
97 protected:
98  unique_ptr<ArchiveWriter> _writer;
99 
100  virtual bool write(const uint8_t *p, size_t len);
101  virtual bool close();
102 
103  ArchiveXmlWriter(const ArchiveXmlWriter&&) _DELETED_;
104 };
